68
69#define _mg_buffer_zero(buffer) \
70 do { \
71 if (buffer) { \
72 (buffer)->value = NULL; \
73 (buffer)->length = 0; \
74 } \
75 } while(0)
76
77#define _mg_oid_set_zero(oid_set) \
78 do { \
79 if (oid_set) { \
80 (oid_set)->elements = NULL; \
81 (oid_set)->count = 0; \
82 } \
83 } while(0)
